columns.name: Dependent_Count
columns.description: The number of people that the client supports financially with their card

columns.name: Education_Level
columns.description: The highest level of education that the client has received

columns.name: state_cd
columns.description: The short code of the state that the client resides in

columns.name: Zipcode
columns.description: The zip code of the place that the client resides in

columns.name: Car_Owner
columns.description: Indication to find out if the client owns a car or not

columns.name: House_Owner
columns.description: Indication to find out if the client owns a house or not

columns.name: Personal_loan
columns.description: Indication to find out if the client has personal loan or not

columns.name: contact
columns.description: The type of contact that the client has provided

columns.name: Income
columns.description: The amount that the client earns

columns.name: Cust_Satisfaction_Score
columns.description: The satisfaction score that the client has provided for the service
